name: apple-notifier-mcp
description: Enhanced MCP server for sending native macOS notifications with terminal-notifier support, interactive dialogs, text-to-speech, screenshots, and file selection.

tools.name: send_notification
tools.description: Send native macOS notifications using terminal-notifier with customizable title, message, subtitle, and sound options.

tools.name: prompt_user
tools.description: Display interactive dialog prompts to get user input with customizable buttons and icons.

tools.name: speak
tools.description: Use macOS text-to-speech capabilities with voice and rate customization.

tools.name: take_screenshot
tools.description: Capture screenshots using macOS screencapture with multiple format and type options.

tools.name: select_file
tools.description: Open native macOS file picker dialog with file type filtering and multiple selection support.

system.name: terminal-notifier
system.description: Required system-level tool for sending notifications with custom icons. Must be installed manually even with DXT.
system.note: DXT does not install system-level dependencies. This must be installed separately.

notification_icon.title: Custom Notification Icon
notification_icon.description: Path to custom app icon for notifications (optional)
